channel.title: Hover Over - Disabled how do i Enable it?
channel.description:
Hello Rune-Server
In my client i have tryed to add Critical Hitmarks and for some reason Hover Over is now disabled. Im sure i have done something wrong but i cannot find out what exacly i have done wrong,
So this is how it looks like:
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3298302/KUT.png[/img]
If someone could help me with this problem i REALLY appreciate this. I will give a Rep+Thanks,
Remco
